Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class ChooseColorController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.ChooseColorController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class ChooseColorController extends Object implements GUIController
This class is the controller of the "choose color" view.
